ValidationRule.description: If certain outcomes are selected, the PNR field becomes mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Outcome__c, "Completed Request (PNR Required)"), ISPICKVAL(Outcome__c, "Completed Request - Goodwill Gesture (PNR Required)") ) && ISBLANK(PNR__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the PNR of the booking
